title: Draft Project Proposal from Client Brief
description: An agent must draft a project proposal based on a client's initial project brief document.

tasks.description: Analyze the provided client brief to extract key objectives, scope, and constraints.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the client's main goals (e.g., 'reduce operational costs by 15%') and constraints (e.g., '6-month timeline').

tasks.description: Draft the 'Our Understanding' and 'Proposed Scope' sections of the proposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates well-structured text that accurately reflects the client's needs and defines clear project boundaries.

tasks.description: Create a high-level project timeline with key phases (e.g., Discovery, Analysis, Recommendation, Implementation).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a logical timeline with estimated durations for each phase.
